Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
Barbarian Feats: 11 selections
Fury Instinct: +1 Class Feat
General Feats: 5 selections
Half-Orc: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Instinct: 1 selection/Has the Anathema feature
Natural Ambition: +1 Class Feat
Raging Intimidation: Has the Intimidating Glare feature
Raging Intimidation: Has the Scare To Death feature
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Acute Vision: Has the Darkvision feature during rage
Anathema: May not perform acts or use spells prohibited by barbarian instinct
Half-Orc: Has the orc trait and may take orc and half-orc feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Reckless Abandon: (F) Gives -2 Armor Class, -1 saves, and +2 attacks at the start of a turn until rage ends when reduced to 164 or fewer Hit Points
Perception: +30 (wisdom; master)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +26 (dexterity; trained) Gnome Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) River Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)

Arcana: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +32 (charisma; legendary) Society: +4 (intelligence; untrained)

Deception: +4 (charisma; untrained) Nature: +28 (wisdom; expert) Tea Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert)

Skill Notes:
Barbarian Skills: Skill Trained (Athletics; Choose 7 from any)
Canny Acumen (Perception): Perception Master
Heightened Senses: Perception Master
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Natural Skill: Skill Trained (Choose 2 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Forest Lore): Skill Trained (Forest Lore)

Acute Scent: Has R30' imprecise scent during rage
Assurance (Athletics): Can take an automatic 38 on Athletics checks
Assurance (Farming Lore): Can take an automatic 32 on Farming Lore checks
Assurance (Nature): Can take an automatic 34 on Nature checks
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Expeditious Search: Can Search at 2x normal Speed
Incredible Initiative: +2 on initiative rolls
Quick Jump: Can use High Jump and Long Jump as 1 action without an initial Stride
Raging Athlete: Has a 25' climb and swim Speed, -10 jump DC, and 5' and 15' vertical and horizontal Leaps during rage
Scare To Death: (1) R30' Successful Intimidation vs. foe Will DC inflicts frightened 2; critical success inflicts frightened 2 and fleeing for 1 rd (save Fortitude critical success negates; critical failure inflicts death); failure inflicts frightened 1
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 328 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (4 max); master) Class DC: Barbarian: 40 (strength; master)
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Light Hammer (+30 1d6+4 B R20'; strength; master); Longsword (+30 1d8+4 S/P; strength; master); Sap (+30 1d6+4 B; strength; master)
Combat Notes:
Animal Skin: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Armor Of Fury: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Heavy Armor)
Brutality: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Devastator: Class Master (Barbarian)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Fury Instinct: Increases added rage damage to 12
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Mighty Rage: Class Expert (Barbarian)
Quick Rage: Has increased Rage effects
Specialization Ability: Has increased instinct ability rage effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry (Sawtooth Saber): Weapon Familiarity (Sawtooth Saber)
Weapon Fury: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Animal Skin: +2 Armor Class in no armor during rage
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Awesome Blow: Can attempt an Athletics vs. Fortitude check after using Knockback; success or critical success inflicts the success or critical success effects of Shove and Trip
Bestial Rage (Ape): Can use fists to inflict 1d12+12 HP bludgeoning during rage
Bestial Rage (Bear): Can use jaws and claws to inflict 1d12+12 HP piercing and 1d8+12 HP slashing during rage
Bestial Rage (Bull): Can use horns to inflict 1d12+12 HP piercing during rage
Bestial Rage (Cat): Can use jaws and claws to inflict 1d12+12 HP piercing and 1d8+12 HP slashing during rage
Bestial Rage (Deer): Can use antlers to inflict 1d12+12 HP piercing with a 10' reach during rage
Bestial Rage (Frog): Can use jaws and tongue to inflict 1d12+12 HP bludgeoning and 1d6+12 HP bludgeoning with a 10' reach during rage
Bestial Rage (Shark): Can use jaws to inflict 1d12+12 HP piercing during rage
Bestial Rage (Snake): Can use fangs to inflict 1d12+12 HP piercing during rage
Bestial Rage (Wolf): Can use jaws to inflict 1d12+12 HP piercing during rage
Brutal Bully: A successful Disarm, Grapple, Shove, or Trip inflicts 4 HP bludgeoning during rage
Brutal Critical: Critical melee hits inflict an additional damage die and 2 damage dice persistent bleed damage
Brutality: Critical hits with a melee weapon or unarmed attack inflict its critical specialization effect during rage
Cleave: (R) Makes a melee Strike on an adjacent foe after killing a foe or knocking one unconscious during rage
Collateral Thrash: Thrash damages a second adjacent foe (save basic Reflex)
Come And Get Me: (1) Suffers flat-footed and +2 HP foe damage until rage ends; successful attackers suffer flat-footed until the end of the next turn, and a successful Strike on an attacker during that time gives self 4 temporary Hit Points, or 8 temporary Hit Points on a critical success, until the rage ends
Contagious Rage: Can use Share Rage unlimited times, also sharing instinct and specialization abilities
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of equal or lower level
Devastator: Successful melee Strikes ignore resistance 10 to physical damage
Draconic Rage: Can inflict +16 HP cold damage instead of +12 HP weapon damage during rage
Dragon's Rage Breath: (2) Breath inflicts 20d6 HP cold in a 30' cone or 60' line once per rage (save basic Reflex; half distance and damage for a 2nd use within 1 hr)
Dragon's Rage Wings: (1) Gains a 25' fly Speed during rage
Fast Movement: Gains +10 Speed during rage
Furious Bully: +2 Athletics for attacks during rage
Furious Finish: (1) Strike inflicts additional damage equal to the number of rounds remaining in rage, ending rage and causing fatigue until 10 min rest
Furious Grab: (1) Grapples a foe after a successful Strike during rage
Furious Sprint: (2) Strides 125' in a straight line, or 200' by using 3 actions, during rage
Giant's Lunge: (1) Extends reach of melee weapons and unarmed attacks to 10' until rage ends
Giant's Stature: (1) Increases size to Large, giving +5' reach and clumsy 1, until rage ends
Great Cleave: Can continue to use Cleave on adjacent foes for as long as Strikes incapacitate
Intimidating Glare: Can use a glare to Demoralize
Knockback: (1) Shoves a foe 5' after a successful Strike during rage
Mighty Rage: (F) Immediately uses a 1-action rage action when starting to rage; using 2 actions to enter rage allows using a 2-action rage action
Moment Of Clarity: (1) Allows using concentration actions for the remainder of the turn during rage
No Escape: (R) Stride keeps pace with a retreating foe during rage
Perfect Clarity: (R) Ends rage to gain a +2 reroll on a failed attack or Will save
Predator's Pounce: (1) Strikes after a Stride in light or no armor during rage
Rage: (1) Gains 24 temporary Hit Points and +12 HP melee damage, or +6 HP with an agile weapon, and suffers -1 Armor Class and loss of concentration actions for 1 min; requires 1 turn between rages
Raging Intimidation: Can use Demoralize and Scare To Death during rage
Raging Thrower: Thrown weapons inflict +12 HP and can apply Brutal Critical and Devastator effects during rage
Renewed Vigor: (1) Gains 14 temporary Hit Points during rage
Second Wind: Can rage again immediately after ending rage, suffering fatigue afterwards until 10 min rest
Shake It Off: (1) Reduces a frightened condition by 1 and a sickened condition by 1, 2, or 3 with a fail, success, or critical success on a Fortitude save during rage
Share Rage: (1) R30' Gives an ally the effects of Rage once per rage
Spirit Rage: May inflict +13 HP positive or negative damage, along with ghost touch, instead of +12 HP weapon damage during rage
Spirit's Wrath: (1) R120' +32 spirit Strike during rage inflicts 4d8+4 HP negative or positive; a critical hit also inflicts frightened 1
Spirits'Interference: (1) Imposes a DC 5 flat check on foe ranged Strikes vs. self until rage ends
Sudden Charge: (2) Makes a melee Strike after 2 Strides
Sudden Leap: (2) Makes a melee Strike while Leaping, High Jumping, or Long Jumping up to 50'
Swipe: (2) Melee Strike attacks 2 adjacent foes
Terrifying Howl: (1) Successful Intimidate checks Demoralize each foe in a 30' radius once per target per min during rage
Thrash: (1) Inflicts 16 HP bludgeoning plus specialization damage on a grabbed foe (save basic Fortitude) during rage
Titan Mauler: Can use weapons made for a larger creature, suffering clumsy 1 and gaining +18 HP weapon damage, instead of gaining +12 HP weapon damage during rage
Titan's Stature: Giant's Stature can increase size to Huge, giving +10' reach and clumsy 1, until rage ends
Vengeful Strike: (R) While using Come And Get Me, responds to a successful foe attack with an immediate Strike
Vicious Evisceration: (2) Successful Strike also inflicts drained 1, or drained 2 on a critical success, during rage
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, or +8 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Whirlwind Strike: (3) Makes individual Strikes at the current multiple attack penalty against all foes within reach
Wounded Rage: (R) Enters rage upon suffering the triggering damage
Save: Fortitude: +32 (constitution; legendary); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Greater Juggernaut: Save Legendary (Fortitude)
Indomitable Will: Save Master (Will)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Breath Control: +1 vs. inhaled threats, and successes vs. inhaled threats are critical successes
Greater Juggernaut: Critical failures on Fortitude saves are normal failures, and failed Fortitude saves inflict half damage
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Indomitable Will: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Raging Resistance (Animal): Has resistance 7 to piercing and slashing during rage
Raging Resistance (Dragon): Has resistance 7 to piercing and cold during rage
Raging Resistance (Fury): Has resistance 7 to physical weapon damage during rage
Raging Resistance (Giant): Has resistance 7 to bludgeoning and a choice of cold, electricity, or fire during rage
Raging Resistance (Spirit): Has resistance 7 to negative and undead during rage
Magic
Magic Notes:
Animal Rage: (1) Transforms self into instinct animal during rage for 1 min or until dismissed
Dragon Transformation: (1) Transforms into a Large dragon, as with 6th-level Dragon Form, with +20 fly Speed, +12 dragon Strikes, and +14 HP breath weapon damage during rage
Quaking Stomp: (1) Invokes Earthquake effects during rage once per 10 min
Notes
Validation Errors:
